bike.description: Stumpjumper FSR M5 Manipulated Alloy frame w/ ORE TT/DT, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, DMD Direct Mount F. Der, replaceable derailleur hanger, disc only, 120mm travel

components.description: Specialized AFR Brain Shock w/ remote Trail Tune inertia valve, rebound adj. and Brain Fade, 7.25x1.75"
Shimano M770 XT, DMD, top swing, dual pull
Thomson Elite Setback w/ 12 degree clamp, S/M: 367mm L/XL: 410mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 36.9mm clamp ID, for carbon frame black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
